title: How to Evolve Phantump Without Trading with Other People

steps.title: Start a trade with yourself.
steps.content: Start a trade with yourself. When your two gaming platforms are near each other, you will be offered the option to trade Pokémon. You can start the trade with either character.

steps.title: Trade Pokémon.
steps.content: Trade Pokémon. You can trade your Phantump in one game as the other trades a Froakie. When both players accept the trade, Phantump will evolve into Trevenant automatically.

steps.title: Trade the Pokémon back.
steps.content: Trade the Pokémon back. The other player can trade back the Trevenant and you can send back the Froakie.
